content: X-MS Cable stacker MC/AC cable stacker for supporting multiple metal-clad/armored cables directly to walls or ceilings ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Fastening elements- - - ### FEATURES:Features Time-saving solution – MC stacker delivered ready to install using Hilti battery-powered tools Suitable for use with the X-FG B3-FE magnetic fastener guide Versatile – you can install the same cable stackers on ceilings or walls Easy cable insertion – either dropped in while open, or pulled through while closed Designed for future changes – cable stacker can be easily reopened for post-installation and maintenance of cables Applications Support for metal-clad or armored (type MC/AC) cables on ceilings and walls Support for EMT conduits on ceilings and walls ### TECHNICAL DATA: Application: Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings Material: Carbon steel Attachable to: Directly to base material Technical Data | Application | Conduit Fastening, Cable Fastenings | Material | Carbon steel | Attachable to | Directly to base material | Base materials | Concrete | Approvals (global) | UL | Environmental Conditions | Dry indoor | MC cable capacity (max) | 7 | Product Class | Ultimate ### ITEMS- 2256717 - X-MS 3 MC stacker for wall/ceiling applications - Package Size 50 pc
